lines.text: Marrying my husband was no mistake. I had my reason, only I can't remember what it is.
Nothing is more sacred to me than this - making life and love. That is my religion.
I'm a queen. I have five children. I'm a queen!
It's true what they say about you Pollack girls. All they have to do is blow in their ear. But with you, all I had to do was look at you.
Put this in your pipe and smoke it!

[chasing Hala to have sex]
Your house? Are you crazy? Where are your parents?

[awakens and walks to outside door where Hala and sailor are]
Hala?
I thought you said your mother was dead?
[Tosses around in bed, sits up screaming]

[wakes up]
What is it Bolek, did you have a bad dream?
You speared me with your toe nails, they're like daggers!
